description:
Your Job

We are currently seeking a Senior Sales Force Effectiveness (SFE) Manager to support training implementation and facilitation across our Consumer Products Group (CPG) with an emphasis on our Retail Sales Division. The Sr. SFE Manager will be part of a dynamic sales and training enablement team advancing the overall CPG Sales Organization vision and priorities through tailored training creation and execution, supervisory skill building, and process optimization efforts.

This role provides the flexibility to work anywhere in the USA (with a preference near a major metro area) reporting into a Senior Director of Training and Virtual Sales located in Atlanta, Georgia.

What You Will Do

Primary responsibilities may include, but are not limited to:
• Managing the development, creation, execution, and facilitation of training programs.
• Enhancing Supervisors coaching effectiveness through tailored trainings and one on one coaching discussions.
• Advising Supervisors as they create actionable individualized training and competency development plans for their direct reports.
• Providing consultative coaching to Supervisor and sellers to advance sales-related activities, processes, practices, and expectations.
• Activating sales enablement initiatives to drive the business vision and growth priorities.
• Collaborating with internal CPG capabilities, such as Customer Planning, Customer Investment, Consumer Experience, Category Management, and Category Brand Teams to drive and manage SFE Projects and/or process improvement efforts.

Who You Are (Basic Qualifications)
• 5+ years of experience in CPG retail, grocery, or omni-channel sales, sales training, customer service, business and/or relationship development role.
• Experience in Microsoft Office Suite of Outlook, PowerPoint, Word and Excel
• Willing to travel up to 30%

What Will Put You Ahead
• Bachelor’s degree
• Experience creating and facilitating adult learning and sales training sessions.
• Experience in Salesforce.com

At Koch companies, we are entrepreneurs. This means we openly challenge the status quo, find new ways to create value and get rewarded for our individual contributions. Any compensation range provided for a role is an estimate determined by available market data. The actual amount may be higher or lower than the range provided considering each candidate's knowledge, skills, abilities, and geographic location. If you have questions, please speak to your recruiter about the flexibility and detail of our compensation philosophy.

Hiring Philosophy

All Koch companies value diversity of thought, perspectives, aptitudes, experiences, and backgrounds. We are Military Ready and Second Chance employers. Learn more about our hiring philosophy here.

For this role we anticipate paying $100K to $150K plus eligibility for a sales incentives based on individual and business performance.

Who We Are

At Koch, employees are empowered to do what they do best to make life better. Learn how our business philosophy helps employees unleash their potential while creating value for themselves and the company.

Our Benefits

Our goal is for each employee, and their families, to live fulfilling and healthy lives. We provide essential resources and support to build and maintain physical, financial, and emotional strength - focusing on overall wellbeing so you can focus on what matters most. Our benefits plan includes - medical, dental, vision, flexible spending and health savings accounts, life insurance, ADD, disability, retirement, paid vacation/time off, educational assistance, and may also include infertility assistance, paid parental leave and adoption assistance. Specific eligibility criteria is set by the applicable Summary Plan Description, policy or guideline and benefits may vary by geographic region. If you have questions on what benefits apply to you, please speak to your recruiter.

Equal Opportunities

Equal Opportunity Employer, including disability and protected veteran status. Except where prohibited by state law, all offers of employment are conditioned upon successfully passing a drug test. This employer uses E-Verify. Please visit the following website for additional information: http://www.kochcareers.com/doc/Everify.pdf
